headline: The Massive Expansion of McDonald's
summary: McDonald's has huge expansion plans. The company aims to have around 50,000 global locations, adding almost 10,000 to its count over four years, with a focus on places like Texas where it has fallen behind. Bloomberg's Kristina Peterson reports.

raw.headline: The Massive Expansion of McDonald's

headline: Restaurant customers are seeking deals at the highest rate in 50 years
summary: The share of deal-driven traffic has surged at a level not seen since the Great Recession of 2008-2010, according to Circana

headline: McDonald's Drives Sustainable Growth Through Loyalty & Menu Innovation
summary: MCD fuels growth with loyalty gains, menu hits like the Chicken Big Mac and global expansion despite inflation headwinds.

raw.headline: McDonald's Drives Sustainable Growth Through Loyalty & Menu Innovation
raw.summary: MCD fuels growth with loyalty gains, menu hits like the Chicken Big Mac and global expansion despite inflation headwinds.

headline: United Real Estate Recognized Among Top Four Real Estate Franchisors in the Nation
summary: United® Real Estate has once again earned a coveted spot on the Franchise Times Top 400 list, marking its ninth consecutive spotlight among America's largest franchise organizations by systemwide sales. United was the top grower in the real estate category, with sales increasing 4.8 percent. It is ranked the No. 4 largest real estate franchise organization, and its sister company, United Country, ranks No. 5.

headline: Citi Maintains a Buy on McDonald (MCD), Raises the PT
summary: McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) is one of the Top Blue Chip Stocks to Buy At 52-Week Lows. On September 17, Jon Tower from Citi maintained a Buy rating on McDonald’s Corporation (NYSE:MCD) while raising the price target from $373 to $381.
